00004 void InputManager::KeyPressed(InputCodes code)
00005 {
00006         // Validate camera
00007         if (m_camera == nullptr)
00008                 return;
00009 
00010         switch (code)
00011         {
00012                 // Move forwards
00013                 case Up: case W: case w:
00014                         m_player->MoveForward((float)(TimeManager::Instance().DeltaTime));
00015                         break;
00016                 // Move backwards
00017                 case Down: case S: case s:
00018                         m_player->MoveBackward((float)(TimeManager::Instance().DeltaTime));
00019                         break;
00020                 case Left: case A: case a:
00021                         m_player->TurnAntiClock((float)(TimeManager::Instance().DeltaTime));
00022                         break;
00023                 case Right: case D: case d:
00024                         m_player->TurnClock((float)(TimeManager::Instance().DeltaTime));
00025                         break;
00026                 case q: case Q:
00027                         glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_LINE);
00028                         break;
00029                 case 101: case E:
00030                         glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_FILL);
00031                         break;
00032         }
00033 }

00035 void InputManager::MousePressed(InputCodes code, float mouseX, float mouseY)
00036 {
00037         if (m_camera == nullptr)
00038                 return;
00039 
00040         switch (code)
00041         {
00042         case MouseButtonLeft:
00043                 m_camera->ChangeAngleAroundPlayer(mouseX);
00044                 break;
00045         case MouseButtonRight:
00046                 m_camera->ChangePitch(mouseY);
00047                 break;
00048         default:
00049                 break;
00050         }
00051 }

00053 void InputManager::WheelScrolled(double yoffset)
00054 {
00055         if (m_camera == nullptr)
00056                 return;
00057 
00058         m_camera->Zoom(yoffset);
00059 }
